com.jme3.bullet.joints.motors

Class RotationalLimitMotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.bullet.joints.motors.RotationalLimitMotor

  • public class RotationalLimitMotor
extends java.lang.Object
    A motor based on Bullet's btRotationalLimitMotor. Motors are used to drive joints.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RotationalLimitMotor(long motor)
      Instantiate a motor for the identified btRotationalLimitMotor.

      • getDamping

        public float getDamping()
        Read this motor's damping.
        Returns:
        the viscous damping ratio (0→no damping, 1→critically damped)

      • setDamping

        public void setDamping(float damping)
        Alter this motor's damping.
        Parameters:
        damping - the desired viscous damping ratio (0→no damping, 1→critically damped, default=1)
